description:
Uzume receives a special team card from Lord Rafflesia. In order to use the power contained within the card, the hearts of Uzume and her dolls must be completely in sync. However, this proved to be much more difficult than expected, and instead unrest grows between them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Heart Tart? All Together As One
心ころころ? あわせてひとつ
